WeProvide: We provide premium monthly rentals and curated livind experiences
OurCarefully: Our carefully selected homes offer comfort, style, and a seamless long-stay experience in Málaga.
FromModern: From modern apartments to boutique city homes, every property is professionally managed for quality and ease. Enjoy transparent pricing, flexible stays, and dedicated support designed to make your long-term rental journey effortless.
SeamlessRental: A Seamless Rental Experiences Designed for Modern Felx-Living
WeSimplify: We simplify every step, offering curated homes, transparent pricing, and dedicated support for stress-free medium-term rentals.
BrowseHandpicked: Browse a handpicked selection of premium, fully equipped monthly rentals across Málaga’s best neighbourhoods.
ChooseYour: Choose your preferred property and submit a quick request share your dates, stay purpose, and any requirements.
OurTeam: Our team contacts you promptly, finalizes the details, and guides you through the smooth move-in process.
FindPerfectHome: Find the Perfect Home for Your Stay
ExperienceThoughtfully: Experience a thoughtfully crafted stay where modern design, functionality, and effortless living come together.
RealExperiences: Real experiences from tenants who trusted us with their long-term stay in Málaga.
NeedClarity: Need Clarity? We’ve Got You Covered
question1: How does the inquiry and approval process work?
answer1: You can request a rental by selecting a property and submitting the inquiry form with your dates and details. Our team will contact you soon with availability and next steps.
question2: Do you require a security deposit?

PremiumRentalHeading: Don’t Miss Out on Premium Rentals. Secure Your Ideal Home in Málaga
PremiumRentalDescription: Be the first to explore our curated monthly rentals. Limited homes, premium locations, and dedicated support—reserve your spot now.
PremiumRentalLine1: Be the first to explore our curated monthly rentals. Limited homes, premium locations, and dedicated support—reserve your spot now.
AboutRentalariaSubtitle: Premium Monthly Rentals in Málaga, Curated with Experience & Care.
AboutRentalariaDescription: With years of expertise in hospitality and property management, we curate beautifully designed apartments for professionals, digital nomads, and families relocating to the city.
WelcomeDescription: Discover a new way to enjoy long-term living—effortless, peaceful, and beautifully designed. At Rentalaria, we bring together stunning locations, modern amenities, and warm hospitality to create a stay that feels like a true escape.
WelcomeTagline: Enjoy the comfort. Live the experience.
ListPropertySubtitle: List Your Property Seamlessly with Our Platform
VerifiedSafeDescription: Multi-step verification, document checks, and manual review ensure every listing is trustworthy and completely secure.
BetterEarningsDescription: Smart pricing tools and zero hidden fees help you maximise your monthly rental income with full transparency.
ReachMoreRentersDescription: Your property gets promoted to high-intent renters, giving you more visibility, more inquiries, and faster occupancy.
ListingProcessDescription: We make the listing process simple, secure, and profitable. Whether you're an individual homeowner or managing multiple rentals, our platform ensures your property gets maximum visibility and reliable tenants faster.
HowItWorksStep1Desc: Submit your property information, photos, pricing, and stay requirements through our simple online form.
HowItWorksStep2Desc: Our team reviews your details and fine-tunes your listing to make it look professional and renter-ready.
HowItWorksStep3Desc: After approval, your property goes live and immediately reaches active mid-term renters.
HowItWorksStep4Desc: Interested renters send inquiries directly to you, and you can confirm bookings easily.
SupportSubtitle: Reach Out for Any Assistance or Inquiries
NewsletterDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter and we’ll keep you informed about new properties
RecoverPasswordDescription: Don’t worry, happens to all of us. Enter your email below to recover your password
